channel.title: How do you fix Logout?
channel.description: How do I fix the logout button so players cant log out during combat?

item.title: How do you fix Logout?

i tried that but it wont let me log out even after 30 seconds

item.title: How do you fix Logout?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Sec, i’ll get it you.

Ok, here it is.

case 9154: //Log out
                                        if (LogoutDelay >= 0)
                                        {
                                        sendMessage("You have to wait 30 seconds out of being in combat to logout.");
                                        }
                                        else
                                        {
				logout();
                                                savemoreinfo();
                                                saveStats();
                                        }
						break;

If you aint got the save stats or whatsoever tht iv got take out what u aint got lol.

If you dunno how to go about putting it, well that’s tough tbh cos i cba atm >.<

Good luck

Read full topic
